programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Comedy starring Owen Wilson, Kate Hudson and Matt Dillon. Newlyweds Carl and Molly Peterson are settling down to what they hope will be the perfect life together. Then Carl feels duty bound to give his friend Randy Dupree shelter for a few days and the homeless slacker soon becomes a cuckoo in their love nest Anthony Russo - Director Joe Russo (1) - Director Owen Wilson - Randy Dupree Kate Hudson - Molly Peterson Matt Dillon - Carl Peterson Michael Douglas (1) - Mr Thompson Seth Rogen - Neil Amanda Detmer - Annie Ralph Ting - Toshi Lance Armstrong - Lance Armstrong.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Chris Pratt and Jennifer Lawrence. Passengers aboard a corporate spaceship have been put into hibernation for the journey to a colony, but a mechanical engineer accidentally wakes up 90 years ahead of schedule. The journalist he awakens to keep him company is far from impressed as their chances of living long enough to make it to their destination are slim Morten Tyldum - Director Chris Pratt - James Preston Jennifer Lawrence - Aurora Lane Michael Sheen - Arthur Laurence Fishburne - Gus Mancuso Andy Garcia - Captain Norris Aurora Perrineau - Celeste.

programme.title: Five Nights at Freddy's
programme.desc: Mike Schmidt accepts a position as night-time security guard at the abandoned pizzeria, where families used to flock in their droves in the 1980s. He is desperate to earn money to keep a roof over the head of his younger sister Abby, but is soon locked in a fight for survival. Horror thriller based on a series of video games, starring Josh Hutcherson and Piper Rubio Emma Tammi - Director Josh Hutcherson - Mike Schmidt Elizabeth Lail - Vanessa Piper Rubio - Abby Mary Stuart Masterson - Aunt Jane Matthew Lillard - Steve Raglan Kevin Foster - Freddy Fazbear.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. Reporting from the frontline, Miller captures indelible images of the conflict, including the horrors found in the Nazi concentration camps at Buchenwald and Dachau Ellen Kuras - Director Kate Winslet - Lee Miller Andy Samberg - Davy Scherman Alexander Skarsgård - Roland Penrose Marion Cotillard - Solange D'Ayen Andrea Riseborough - Audrey Withers Noémie Merlant - Nusch Eluard Josh O'Connor - Young Man / Antony Penrose James Murray - Colonel Spencer Arinzé Kene - Major Jonesy Vincent Colombe - Paul Eluard.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Black comedy starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis. Three downtrodden, demoralised workers decide enough is enough and hatch a plan to kill each other's bosses. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The second part of Peter Jackson's epic adaptation of JRR Tolkien's classic fantasy adventure, starring Elijah Wood and Ian McKellen. Hobbits Frodo and Sam, now separated from the rest of the fellowship, travel deep into the realm of the evil Lord Sauron to destroy the ring. programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Mark Rylance. In 2045, society's main entertainment is an ultra-immersive virtual reality simulation called the "OASIS". Its late creator, James Halliday, has hidden an Easter egg within the game that, if unlocked, will grant ownership to the finder. programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Second World War drama directed by Steven Spielberg and starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore and Edward Burns, and featuring Matt Damon. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Adam Driver and Penélope Cruz. Enzo Ferrari and his wife Laura have equal shares in their car-manufacturing company, but their marriage is in tatters following the death of their son, while the business is in financial peril. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta and Joe Pesci. programme.title: The Godfather

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Supernatural horror comedy sequel starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. Her teenage daughter, Astrid, is sceptical and distant, still mourning the death of her father some years before. But then Astrid has her own perilous brush with the beyond - and her despairing mother realises there's only one being who can help her out.. programme.title: Blade
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Action, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 1998 ║ 18
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure based on the Marvel Comics character, starring Wesley Snipes as vampire killer Blade. In a world where vampires and humans co-exist in relative harmony, maverick bloodsucker Deacon Frost (Stephen Dorff) threatens to unleash a powerful force that will take over the Earth. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple Kelly Marcel - Director Tom Hardy - Eddie Brock / Venom Chiwetel Ejiofor - Strickland Juno Temple - Teddy Rhys Ifans - Martin Moon Stephen Graham - Patrick Mulligan Peggy Lu - Mrs Chen Alanna Ubach - Nova Moon Andy Serkis - Knull.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: Promising Young Woman
programme.desc: Oscar-winning thriller starring Carey Mulligan. Haunted by a traumatic incident from her time at medical school, 30-year-old Cassie spends her evenings ensnaring predatory men in clubs and teaching them some harsh life lessons. programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Documentary And Factual, Science And Technology, History ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Comedy drama based on a true story, starring Jay Baruchel, Matt Johnson and Glenn Howerton. programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Frank Langella and Michael Sheen. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. So when talk-show host David Frost persuades Nixon to agree to a series of televised interviews, it is the perfect opportunity for the British TV star to make a name for himself. But Nixon has his own reasons for taking part, and the resulting confrontation will go down in television history Ron Howard - Director Frank Langella - Richard Nixon Michael Sheen - David Frost Kevin Bacon - Jack Brennan Rebecca Hall - Caroline Cushing Toby Jones - Swifty Lazar Matthew Macfadyen - John Birt Oliver Platt - Bob Zelnick Sam Rockwell - James Reston Jr Clint Howard - Lloyd Davis Patty McCormack - Pat Nixon.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Supernatural horror comedy sequel starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. Her teenage daughter, Astrid, is sceptical and distant, still mourning the death of her father some years before. But then Astrid has her own perilous brush with the beyond - and her despairing mother realises there's only one being who can help her out.. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.desc: The locals decide to raise 150,000 pounds for a memorial commemorating fishermen lost at sea. Plus, Pat considers taking part in a skydive, and the search for scallops begins. (7/10).

programme.desc: The tides are turning as Brixham's oldest traditions begin to fade. Pat ponders selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks puts on the Crab Festival. (8/10).

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v IND 2007
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2007 contest with India at the inaugural edition of the competition.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v WI 2016
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's infamous final with the West Indies in 2016.

programme.title: 1st ODI: ENG v WI Highlights
programme.desc: Stepping up to the mantle of white-ball captain, Harry Brook succeeds Jos Buttler and takes charge of England's home series against the West Indies, beginning with an ODI. (29.05).

programme.title: Women's 1st ODI: ENG v WI Hlts
programme.desc: The West Indies' white-ball tour of England enters the 50-over portion with the first of three ODIs against Charlotte Edwards' England at the County Ground in Derby. (30.05).

programme.title: Women's 2nd ODI: ENG v WI Hlts
programme.desc: After Charlotte Edwards' first ODI in charge, England go again against the Windies. Amy Jones hit a maiden ODI century in the opener, while Linsey Smith took a five-for on debut. (04.06).

programme.title: Women's 3rd ODI: ENG v WI Hlts
programme.desc: The West Indies' white-ball tour of England comes to an end with the third and final women's one-day international in Taunton. (07.06).

programme.title: 1st ODI: ENG v WI Highlights
programme.desc: Stepping up to the mantle of white-ball captain, Harry Brook succeeds Jos Buttler and takes charge of England's home series against the West Indies, beginning with an ODI. (29.05).

programme.title: 2nd ODI: ENG v WI Highlights
programme.desc: Up and running as England's white-ball captain with a 238-run win, Harry Brook aims to maintain a winning start to his reign in the second ODI against the West Indies in Cardiff. (01.06).

programme.desc: Michael van Gerwen faces Phil Taylor in the 2013 Premier League Darts final at the O2. The Dutchman saw off James Wade in the semi-finals, while Taylor took down Raymond van Barneveld.

programme.title: Fight Night: Petitjean v Azim
programme.desc: In just his tenth professional outing, a 21-year-old Adam Azim goes toe to toe with Franck Petitjean of France - the defending EBU European super lightweight champion. (18.11).

programme.title: Fight Night:Billam-Smith/Masternak
programme.desc: Defending the gold in his own backyard, the WBO cruiserweight world champion Chris Billam-Smith is faced by the challenge of a seasoned campaigner in the form of Mateusz Masternak. (10.12).

programme.title: Fight Night: Simpson v Zucco
programme.desc: Barnsley's own Callum Simpson steps out in front of the Oakwell faithful to challenge for the European super-middleweight title against 29-year-old unbeaten Italian Ivan Zucco. (07.06).

programme.title: Women's State Of Origin #3
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Women's State of Origin Series reaches its finale at McDonald Jones Stadium in Newcastle. (29.05).

programme.title: My Icon: Leon Pryce
programme.desc: Former Bradford Bulls and St Helens star Leon Pryce discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: Lions Legends: McBride
programme.desc: ... Willie John McBride. Willie John McBride remembers his time touring with the British & Irish Lions. McBride travelled on five tours with the Lions, making 17 appearances.

programme.title: Lions Legends: Calder
programme.desc: Finlay Calder remembers his time touring with the British & Irish Lions. Calder was the only man in the 20th century to captain the Lions to victory after losing the opening test match.

programme.title: World Cup Of Darts Semi & Final
programme.desc: The 2025 BetVictor World Cup of Darts comes to an end as the coveted title is handed to the winning pair in Frankfurt, Germany.

programme.title: Darts Gold: Matchplay Final 2005
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic darts matches. Here is Colin Lloyd against John Part in the final of the 2005 World Matchplay.

programme.title: Darts Gold: Grand Slam Final 2012
programme.desc: A chance to relive classic darts matches. Here is Michael van Gerwen against Raymond van Barneveld in the final of the 2012 Grand Slam of Darts at the Wolverhampton Civic Hall.

programme.title: Darts Gold: Taylor v Part
programme.desc: A chance to relive some of the PDC's most memorable darts matches. Here, Phil Taylor faces John Part in the final of the 2003 World Darts Championship.

programme.title: Darts Gold: PL Final 2013
programme.desc: Michael van Gerwen faces Phil Taylor in the 2013 Premier League Darts final at the O2. The Dutchman saw off James Wade in the semi-finals, while Taylor took down Raymond van Barneveld.

programme.title: LIVE: NFL: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: Get up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news, headline-making interviews and local NFL stories.

programme.title: My Icon: Leon Pryce
programme.desc: Former Bradford Bulls and St Helens star Leon Pryce discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: S/Lge: Hll KR v Catalans
programme.desc: Hull KR play host to Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. The Robins' title-winning credentials were on full display at Wembley last week, winning a first Challenge Cup since 1980.

programme.title: NBC's Pro-Football Talk
programme.desc: Mike Florio and Chris Simms present this NFL talk show, as they discuss and debate the biggest stories from around the league.

programme.title: Lions Tour Series Hlts 2021
programme.desc: It's one of rugby union's biggest events - Warren Gatland's British & Irish Lions take on World Cup champions South Africa in Cape Town in the opening match of three.

programme.title: Lions Legends: Sir Ian McGeechan
programme.desc: British & Irish Lions legend Sir Ian McGeechan remembers his time with the team. The former Scottish international fly-half enjoyed series victories both as a player and as a coach.

programme.title: Lions Legends: McBride
programme.desc: ... Willie John McBride. Willie John McBride remembers his time touring with the British & Irish Lions. McBride travelled on five tours with the Lions, making 17 appearances.

programme.title: Lions Legends: Calder
programme.desc: Finlay Calder remembers his time touring with the British & Irish Lions. Calder was the only man in the 20th century to captain the Lions to victory after losing the opening test match.

programme.title: Lions Legends: Mervyn Davies
programme.desc: A look at Mervyn Davies' career with the British and Irish Lions. One of the greatest number eights to come out of Wales, "Merv the Swerve" played on tours to New Zealand and South Africa.

programme.title: Abbie Ward: A Bump In The Road
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Bristol Bears and England star Abbie Ward's remarkable journey back to playing rugby, just 17 weeks after the birth of her first child in July 2023.

programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a match during the 2024 NFL season, as Derek Carr and New Orleans take on Jalen Hurts' Philadelphia Eagles. (22.09).

programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights of Minnesota Vikings visiting Matt LaFleur's Green Bay Packers in the NFL. The hosts have won their last two, including their only home match this season. (29.09).

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City/Man Utd 2002
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Manchester City take on Manchester United back in 2002 in the last Manchester derby to be played at Maine Road.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Watford/Fulham 2006
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Watford meet Fulham at Vicarage Road in October 2006 in a remarkable match that had a dramatic late finish.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Liverpool/Chelsea 2001

programme.desc: We take a look back at this thrilling encounter between Manchester United and Liverpool at Old Trafford. Mark Hughes scored twice late on to earn the hosts a share of the spoils.

programme.title: Chelsea v Tottenham 1993/94
programme.desc: We revisit this seven-goal thriller between Chelsea and Tottenham at Stamford Bridge. Mark Stein scored a last-gasp penalty to snatch all three points for Glenn Hoddle's side.

programme.title: Man City v Man Utd - 1993/94
programme.desc: We take a look back at this clash between the two Manchester rivals. City raced into a two-goal lead but it was the visitors who took the points after Eric Cantona's late winner.

programme.title: Tottenham v Newcastle 1994/95
programme.desc: We revisit this classic 1994/95 clash between Tottenham Hotspur and Newcastle United at White Hart Lane. The match featured a stunning hat-trick from an England international.

programme.title: Everton v Liverpool 2000/01
programme.desc: Take a look back at one of the Premier League's classic derby matches between Everton and Liverpool. The points looked to be shared before Gary McAllister stepped up late on.

programme.title: Chelsea v West Ham 2002/03
programme.desc: We revisit West Ham's trip to Stamford Bridge to face Chelsea in the 2002/03 Premier League season. Paulo Di Canio's brace earned the visitors their first win of the season.

programme.title: Tottenham v Leicester City 2003/04
programme.desc: We take a look back at this classic Premier League clash between Tottenham and Leicester. The visitors thought they had snatched the win until Jermain Defoe's late leveller.

programme.desc: We revisit the six-goal 2007/08 Premier League epic between Fulham and Tottenham at Craven Cottage. With pressure mounting on manager Martin Jol, Spurs desperately needed a win.

programme.title: Manchester Utd v Liverpool 2010/11
programme.desc: Take a look back at this classic Premier League clash between Manchester United and Liverpool. Dimitar Berbatov stole the show with a hat-trick for Sir Alex Ferguson's side.

programme.title: Arsenal v Fulham 2012/13

programme.title: Man United v Newcastle 2012/13
programme.desc: Take a look back at this pulsating seven-goal thriller between Manchester United and Newcastle. Javier Hernandez was the hero as his stoppage time goal sealed victory for United.
